title: Russia Resumes Attacks on Ukraine’s Energy System Ahead of Peace Talks
summary_full: Missiles overnight targeted power plants in Kyiv and other parts of the country, according to local authorities, despite President Trump’s request for a pause.
summary_public: Missiles overnight targeted power plants in Kyiv and other parts of the country, according to local authorities, despite President Trump’s request for a pause.

RU.label: negative
RU.evidence: Russia Resumes Attacks on Ukraine’s Energy System
